PaymentRequestUpdateEvent.summary: The PaymentRequestUpdateEvent interface is used for events sent to a instance when changes are made to shipping-related information for a pending . Those events are:

PaymentRequestUpdateEventUpdateWith.summary:
The updateWith() method of the
interface updates the details of an existing
.

PaymentRequestUpdateEventPaymentRequestU.summary:
The PaymentRequestUpdateEvent() constructor creates a new
object which enables a web page to update the
details of a in response to a user action. Actual updates
are made by passing options to the
method.
